name: Hot Fresh Pizza
description:
Hot Fresh Pizza is a survival horror game based around the worst night any pizza delivery person could have 

:CREDITS:

3D Modelling - Jenny Sherwood

Textures - Paul Drummond, Lance (Lanket) Williams

Voice Acting - Erica Chiem, Spencer Brus, Joseph Crewe, Kas Caron

Music Composition - Anthony Duonge

Everything Else - Paul (Wiever) Crewe

Have fun while playing this game, and Happy Halloween
